Class MulticastServerResponse

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • MulticastServerResponse
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class MulticastServerResponse
extends java.lang.Thread
    MulticastServerResponse is a Thread that is created by MulticastServer every time a new packet arrives for processing. It received the packet, Multicast's IP, users and artists array and it's hashCode. This thread contains all methods to deal with all kinds of packets send by the shared.RMIServer.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread

      • Fields inherited from class java.lang.Thread

        MAX_PRIORITY, MIN_PRIORITY, NORM_PRIORITY

    • Method Detail

      • sendResponseMulticast

        public void sendResponseMulticast(java.lang.String resp,
                                  java.lang.String code)
        Creates a MulticastSocket and sends a Datagram packet with some protocol instruction. This method is only run if Multicast's hash matches rmiserver.RMIServer's requested hash.
        Parameters:
        resp - - protocol instruction to send
        code - - unique hash

      • getSocket

        public java.net.ServerSocket getSocket()
        Creates a new MulticastSocket with random port between 5000 and 6000 Used upon a upload/download request.
        Returns:
        MulticastSocket

      • uploadMusic

        public void uploadMusic(java.lang.String id,
                        java.lang.String title,
                        java.lang.String email,
                        java.lang.String code)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Method to upload a music. First checks if music exists in database, if not then sends an answer with result|n and an error message as msg|error here If found then a result|y answer is sent along with Multicast's IP and Port for the client to connect. Afterwards creates a new TCP socket using #getSocket() and awaits RMIClient to connect. Once connected the client sends a filename, size and finally all file's raw data as bytes. These are stored in as a #MusicFile along with email of the uploader.
        Parameters:
        id - Packet's unique ID
        title - Music's title
        email - Email of the user that requested an upload
        code - Multicast server's hash, this method is only run if hash send by shared.RMIServer matches Multicast's hash.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        See Also:
        getSocket(), sendResponseMulticast(String, String)

      • downloadMusic

        public void downloadMusic(java.lang.String id,
                          java.lang.String title,
                          java.lang.String uploader,
                          java.lang.String email,
                          java.lang.String code)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Method do download a music. For now only one MulticastServer contains a user's uploader. First each Multicast needs to search if it is the one that has the uploaded file. If it doesn't then immediately after sends a result|n claiming that it does not have the file and exits. If it does, then first checks if requesting user is allowed to download from the uploader, if not then sends result|n with an error message to display. Otherwise creates a new TCP socket, sends an IP and Port as answer and awaits connection. Once connected, sends file's name and raw data afterwards.
        Parameters:
        id - Packet's unique ID
        title - Music's title
        uploader - Email from whom the user is trying to download
        email - Requesting user's email
        code - Hash sent by shared.RMIServer
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        See Also:
        getSocket(), searchMusic(String, String), sendResponseMulticast(String, String)

      • share

        public void share(java.lang.String id,
                  java.lang.String title,
                  java.lang.String shareTo,
                  java.lang.String uploader,
                  java.lang.String code)
        Method to share an uploaded music with another user. First searches if user did indeed upload that song. If not then answers with result|n and an error message, if found then the user is now allowed to download from uploader and a result|y answer is sent.
        Parameters:
        id - Packet's unique ID
        title - Music's title
        shareTo - User that the uploader want's to share
        uploader - The uploader himself
        code - Hash sent by shared.RMIServer
        See Also:
        getSocket(), sendResponseMulticast(String, String)

      • register

        public void register(java.lang.String id,
                     java.lang.String email,
                     java.lang.String password,
                     java.lang.String code)
        Method to register a new user. First checks if the email is registered already, if not then adds the new user to the database. Answers with result|n for the former and result|y for latter.
        Parameters:
        id - Packet's unique ID
        email - User's new email
        password - User's password
        code - Hash sent by shared.RMIServer
        See Also:
        sendResponseMulticast(String, String)

      • login

        public void login(java.lang.String id,
                  java.lang.String email,
                  java.lang.String password,
                  java.lang.String code)
        Method to login. Checks if email and password match, answering with result|y or result|n if not. If user has any missed notifications, these are added to Multicast's answer.
        Parameters:
        id - Packet's unique ID
        email - User's email
        password - User's password
        code - Hash sent by shared.RMIServer
        See Also:
        sendResponseMulticast(String, String)

      • turnIntoEditor

        public void turnIntoEditor(java.lang.String id,
                           java.lang.String user1,
                           java.lang.String user2,
                           java.lang.String code)
        Method to turn a regular user into an editor. First checks if user1 is actually an editor, if it is then proceeds to find the user that he wants to promote, if found then turns him into an editor and answers with result|y. Otherwise if any of the conditions fail, answers with result|n and an error message instead.
        Parameters:
        id -
        user1 - The promoter
        user2 - The promotee
        code - Hash sent by shared.RMIServer
        See Also:
        sendResponseMulticast(String, String)

      • writeCritic

        public void writeCritic(java.lang.String id,
                        java.lang.String albumName,
                        java.lang.String critic,
                        java.lang.String rate,
                        java.lang.String email,
                        java.lang.String code)
        Method to review and score an album. First checks if album exists, if it does then adds a new rating and review to it. If not found then an error message is returned.
        Parameters:
        id - Packet's unique ID
        albumName - Album's name
        critic - The review itself
        rate - 1-5 rating
        email - User's email that rated
        code - Hash sent by shared.RMIServer
        See Also:
        sendResponseMulticast(String, String)

        public void offUserNotified(java.lang.String id,
                            java.lang.String email,
                            java.lang.String message)
        Method to store offline user's missed notifications
        Parameters:
        email - Offline user's email
        message - Missed notification

      • getDetails

        public void getDetails(java.lang.String id,
                       java.lang.String type,
                       java.lang.String keyword,
                       java.lang.String code)
        Method to get details of an artist or album. Searches by artist name and album's title or genre. If keyword matches then it is added as a new found item to be sent as answer. If nothing is found then returns an error message.
        Parameters:
        id - Packet's unique ID
        type - Either 'art', 'alb' or 'gen' for artist, album and genre respectively
        keyword - Keyword used for the search query
        code - Hash sent by shared.RMIServer
        See Also:
        sendResponseMulticast(String, String)

      • searchMusic

        public Music searchMusic(java.lang.String musicTitle,
                         java.lang.String uploader)
        Method used before downloading a music to see if the file exists in this particular Multicast's database
        Parameters:
        musicTitle - Music's title
        uploader - Uploader's email
        Returns:
        Music object or null if not found
        See Also:
        downloadMusic(String, String, String, String, String)

      • addArtist

        public void addArtist(java.lang.String id,
                      java.lang.String name,
                      java.lang.String details,
                      java.lang.String email,
                      java.lang.String code)
        Method to add/edit an artist. An edit happens if artist's name matches an existing one in database. If edited, then every user that edited this particular artist, it's albums or songs is notified. If user is not an editor then an error message is sent instead.
        Parameters:
        id - Packet's unique ID
        name - Artist's name
        details - Artist's description
        email - Requesting
        code - Hash sent by shared.RMIServer
        See Also:
        sendResponseMulticast(String, String)

      • addAlbum

        public void addAlbum(java.lang.String id,
                     java.lang.String artName,
                     java.lang.String albName,
                     java.lang.String description,
                     java.lang.String genre,
                     java.lang.String email,
                     java.lang.String code)
        Method to add/edit a new album to an artist. An edit happens if album's name matches an existing one in artist's database. Once added/edited every user that has added/edited an album, song or created this artist is notified. If the user is not an editor, or artist's name is not found, then an error message is sent instead.
        Parameters:
        id - Packet's unique ID
        artName - Artist's name
        albName - Album's name
        description - Album's description
        genre - Album's genre
        email - User's email
        code - Hash sent by shared.RMIServer
        See Also:
        sendResponseMulticast(String, String)

      • addMusic

        public void addMusic(java.lang.String id,
                     java.lang.String albName,
                     java.lang.String title,
                     java.lang.String track,
                     java.lang.String email,
                     java.lang.String code)
        Method to add/edit a music. An edit happens if track's number matches an existing one. Once edited/added every user that has modified either the artist, his albums or any of his songs will be notified. If user is not an editor or album's name is not found an error message is sent instead.
        Parameters:
        id - Packet's unique ID
        albName - Album's name
        title - Track's title
        track - Track number
        email - User's email
        code - Hash sent by shared.RMIServer
        See Also:
        sendResponseMulticast(String, String)

      • run

        public void run()
        Thread that receives a packet, parses it with cleanTokens() and calls the respective function depending on type of packet
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread
        See Also:
        cleanTokens(String)
